casino_receptionist.name: Gilded Lotus Receptionist
casino_receptionist.description: An impeccably dressed attendant with a welcoming, yet discerning smile.

dialog.greeting: Welcome to The Gilded Lotus. Please, enjoy the games. You may check the 'rules' at any table.
dialog.games: Downstairs: Dice and Slots. Upstairs: The Elemental Wheel, Blackjack, and the Arcane Vault for those who prefer logic over luck.
dialog.town: We provide a necessary escape from the drudgery of village life.

dice_dealer.name: High-Roller Dealer
dice_dealer.description: A sharp-eyed dealer wearing a vest of red silk. They handle the dice with practiced ease.

dialog.greeting: Place your bets. High number takes the pot. (Type 'rules' for details, or 'bet <amount>')
dialog.rules: Standard 100-sided dice. High number takes the pot. House wins ties. Simple.

mechanical_dealer.name: Automaton Croupier
mechanical_dealer.description: A brass and clockwork construct standing beside a row of slot machines. Its porcelain face mask remains frozen in a pleasant expression.

dialog.greeting: Insert... Coin. Pull... Lever. (Type 'rules' for payout table)
dialog.rules:
Payouts:
3x Dragon: 100x
3x Crown: 25x
3x Potion: 15x
3x Shield: 10x
3x Dagger: 5x
Any Pair: Break Even

wheel_dealer.name: Mystic Spinner
wheel_dealer.description: A robed figure standing beside a massive, colorful wheel. The wheel glows with shifting magical energies.

dialog.greeting: Step forward and test your fate against the elements! (Type 'rules' to see the odds)
dialog.rules: The Void (0x) takes all. Earth (1x) returns your stake. Fire (2x) doubles it. Ice (5x) pays five-fold. And Aether (10x) is the grand prize.
dialog.odds: The Void is vast and hungry. But the rewards of Aether are great for those who dare.

card_dealer.name: Card Shark
card_dealer.description: A calm dealer with impossibly fast hands. They shuffle the deck with a sound like tearing silk.

dialog.greeting: Care for a hand of Twenty-One? (Type 'bet <amount>' to deal)
dialog.rules: Standard rules. Get closer to 21 than me without going over. Face cards are 10, Aces are 1 or 11. I stand on 17. Blackjack pays 3:2.
dialog.advice: Know when to stand, friend. Greed is the fastest way to the poorhouse.

vault_keeper.name: Vault Keeper
vault_keeper.description: A stoic mage wearing thick spectacles and robes covered in geometric patterns. He guards the Arcane Vault.

dialog.greeting: You wish to attempt the Runebreaker? A test of logic, not luck. (Type 'bet <amount>' to begin)
dialog.rules:
I will set a secret code of 3 Runes (Fire, Water, Earth, Air). Duplicates are possible.
You have 8 attempts.
'Perfect' means correct rune in correct spot.
'Partial' means correct rune in wrong spot.
Crack the code to win 5x your wager.
